body.name: KOCH SYSTEME CS 8 Inch Non Stick Frying Pans - Black Plasma Ultra Hard Coated Skillet with Stainless Steel Handle, Oven Safe to 420°F, Non Toxic-Nonstick Coating, Suitable for All Stove, Black Pan

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KOCH SYSTEME CS Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 53 mins
features: DURABLE PLASMA COATING - The plasma coating bonds to the inner and outer surfaces of the pan, forming a hard textured surface that enhances the scratch resistance of the pan and prolongs its service life.
ULTRA NONSTICK & EASY CLEANUP - Non-stick performance enables easy food release with even little oil, and requires only a simple rinse and wipe, saving you time and energy.

COMPATIBLE WITH ANY COOKTOPS - The magnetic base of the pan allows quick and even heat distribution and works well with induction, gas, electric and ceramic cooktops, while being oven safe up to 420℉.
RIVETED STAINLESS STEEL HANDLE - The stay-cool stainless steel handle is comfort, safety, stability and ease of handling. The hole in the handle is for convenient hanging storage.

Professional Products And Reliable Service - KOCH SYSTEME CS plasma nonstick skillets are manufactured according to strict quality standards to provide you with high-quality and practical kitchenware. If you encounter any problems, please feel free to contact our call center. We will provide you with professional solutions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to Find the Right Frying Pan for Your Kitchen? KOCH SYSTEME CS Aluminum Frying Pan with Plasma Ultra Hard Coating is your choice! It is made of professional grade aluminum alloy provides excellent heat conduction and warp-resistance. The plasma ceramic particles are fused to the surface of the pan, forming a hard textured surface that enhances the scratch resistance of the pan and prolongs its service life.

Previous page Durable Plasma Coating Plasma ceramic particles form a hard textured surface that enhances the pan's scratch resistance. Easy to Clean Non-stick performance enables easy food release with little oil, and requires only a simple rinse. Oven Safe to 420℉ KOCH SYSTEME CS aluminum frying pan is oven safe up to 420°F for a wide range of cooking needs. Riveted Stainless Steel Handle Next page 1 PLASMA COATING 2 EASY TO CLEAN 3 OVEN SAFE 4 STAINLESS STEEL HANDLE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pan for omelette
reviews.reviewText: Great little pan for an omelette, which we make like 5 days a week. Good price, $18 as I'm writing this, for the 8" pan. My boyfriend puts everything in the dishwasher (I try to handwash things like this but doesn't always happen) so I didn't want a super expensive pan. Only slightly annoying thing is, make sure the handle is facing up in the dishwasher. The little hole where it attaches to the pan, will hold a lot of water and splash you, if it's not upright in there.The handle DOES get hot on the stovetop even just as short as cooking 2 eggs. I can only use the outer half of the handle at that point.Overall, I like it and I'm considering the larger pan too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorite pans ever!
reviews.reviewText: I've become quite a picky chef after cooking so many meals at home during the pandemic (I didn't cook much before that). And this pan is now officially on my favorites list! It is actually kind of lightweight, which I like - I hate slinging heavy cookware around - but it still distributes heat evenly and is the perfect size for an omelet, side dish, or grilled sandwich. The coating is divine and super easy to clean. I have a smooth, glass-topped stove and this heats up quickly on that. The handle is solid and comfortable shaped and looks pretty awesome too! Recommend.
